messages.title: Leading the fight against the Conservatives' hard Brexit
messages.content: Chris Noyce and the Liberal Democrats are providing the only opposition to the Conservatives' damaging hard Brexit plans.

messages.title: Winning again across Britain
messages.content: Since the referendum, the Lib Dems have gained seats from Labour, UKIP and the Conservatives. This has been the most successful year for the Liberal Democrats in by-elections since records began.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposing the Conservatives' hard Brexit plans
Chris Noyce will be fighting for schools
Chris Noyce will be fighting for our health

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a Lib Dem win in our area can challenge the damaging 'hard' Brexit that will hit the poorest families hardest.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposing the Conservatives' hard Brexit plans that will hit across the country, with the poorest families hit hardest. The Liberal Democrats are challenging the hard Brexit plans.
issues.education: Chris Noyce will be fighting for schools
issues.health: Chris Noyce will be fighting for our health

images.caption: Chris Noyce and the Liberal Democrats are providing the only opposition to the Conservatives' damaging hard Brexit plans.
